content: summer sweater ccoouurrttnneeyy kkeelllleeyy summer sweater ccoouurrttnneeyy kkeelllleeyy specifications stitch patterns yarn k2 p2 ribbing in the round over a mult of 4 kelbourne woolens mojave 60% cotton 40% linen round 1 k1 *p2 k2 repeat from * to 3 sts rem p2 k1 185 yds/50 gm skein smoke gray 046 4 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 repeat round 1 for patt skeins gauge butterfly lace in the round over a mult of 8 + 7 23 5 sts + 33 row = 4 10 cm in stockinette stitch on round 1 *k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk k2 repeat from * to 7 sts larger ndls after blocking rem k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk k1 needles round 2 *k3 sl1wyib k4 repeat from * to 7 sts rem k3 1 us 3 3 25 mm 16 40 cm circular sl1wyib k3 1 us 3 3 25 mm 24 60 cm circular round 3 *k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk k2 repeat from * to 7 sts 1 us 5 3 75 mm 24 60 cm circular rem k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk k1 take time to check your gauge and adjust needle size s accordingly round 4 *k3 sl1wyib k4 repeat from * to 7 sts rem k3 if necessary sl1wyib k3 notions round 5 k4 *k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk k2 repeat from * to 3 tapestry needle stitch holders or waste yarn stitch marker sts rem k3 size round 6 k4 *k3 sl1wyib k4 repeat from * to 3 sts rem k3 38 25 42 25 46 50 54 25 58 5 62 75 66 97 107 5 round 7 k4 *k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk k2 repeat from * to 3 117 127 138 148 5 159 5 167 5 cm finished bust sts rem k3 this project is designed to be worn with 4 8 10 20 cm round 8 k4 *k3 sl1wyib k4 repeat from * to 3 sts rem k3 of positive ease please see schematic for more detailed repeat rnds 1 8 for patt finished measurements skills worthy of note working in the round picking up stitches simple yarn over the summer sweater is worked from the top down and patterning features modified raglan shaping based on elizabeth zimmermann s hurry-up last minute sweater also called abbreviations the december sweater from her book knitter s almanac for a list of commonly used abbreviations in this and other kelbourne woolens patterns please visit the raglan increases are worked every round using kelbournewoolens com/abbreviations yarnover increases on odd-numbered rounds followed by either p1 k1 or k1 p1 in each yarnover on the following even-numbered round after working the neck ribbing the set-up round marks a single stitch at both center front and center back and the remaining stitches are reserved for the sleeves the raglan increases are worked at each end of the front and back sections every round inside the markers the front and back increase by
